article: My family suffered a lot three years ago when my father died in a car accident. It _ my mother, two younger brothers and me alone. At that time, I was in a senior high school. He was glad that he didn't lose _ and still "ran" on the road of life. Facing this guy, I had no pity, but admiration. Inspired by his _ , I went to a city in the south and became an insurance representative. After two years' "running", I got somewhere and my family situation became better _ .
